methodology: Google Maps search + website scraping + industry pricing research

competitors.name: Jives Media
services: SEO (Local SEO, Content SEO, Ecommerce SEO, Video SEO, Enterprise SEO)
Paid Advertising (Google Ads, LinkedIn Ads, Meta/Facebook Ads, Bing Ads, Programmatic)
Social Media Marketing (LinkedIn, Meta, Social Media Management)

pricing.notes: Uses custom quotes rather than transparent, tiered pricing models. Contact required for pricing.

competitors.name: Voy Media
competitors.address: 143 W 29th St Suite 204, New York, NY
services: Custom Audiences and Dynamic Product Ads
Creative Studio (video design, photoshoots, copywriting, graphic design, illustration, video editing, video production, UGC)

pricing.model: Custom quotes - pricing page exists but not disclosed in scrape
pricing.notes: Performance-based, full-service agency model. Claims 92% of clients doubled revenue in first year.

pricing.model: Unknown - content not accessible via scrape
pricing.notes: Website scrape showed mostly CSS/framework code. Need manual review for full details.

Web Design & Development (Brand Identity & Strategy, Brand Websites, E-Commerce Websites, Web Applications, Mobile Applications)
Video Production (Brand Videos, Commercials, Testimonial Videos, Explainer & How-To Videos, Product Videos)

pricing.notes: Operates on custom quotes. No standardized tiered packages.

industry_pricing_benchmarks.source_note: Based on web research of 2025 industry pricing data

small_business.description: Basic services, limited channels, light outreach

mid_sized_business.description: Comprehensive packages with SEO, content creation, analytics, multi-channel campaigns

enterprise.description: Full outsourced SDR teams, multi-region campaigns, extensive multi-channel strategies

facebook_google_ads_agency_fees.hourly_rate: $70 - $190/hr (NYC average), up to $320/hr for top agencies

percentage_of_ad_spend.example: £2,500/mo for budgets under £20,000/mo, or 10% of ad spend for budgets over £20,000/mo

features: Single channel focus (Facebook OR Google Ads)

nyc_specific_rates.minimum_monthly_retainers: $10,000+ for mid-market to enterprise clients (agencies like NoGood, Disruptive Advertising)

key_findings.voice_ai_services: NOT commonly offered by traditional marketing agencies in NYC/LA. This is a differentiator opportunity.
key_findings.lead_generation_focus: Most agencies offer lead gen as part of broader digital marketing, not as standalone Voice AI-powered service.
key_findings.pricing_transparency: Very few agencies display public pricing. Most use custom quotes.
key_findings.typical_services: Facebook Ads, Google Ads, SEO, Social Media Marketing, Web Design, Content Marketing are standard.

recommendations.pricing_strategy: Position Voice AI + Lead Gen packages at $97 (Starter), $997 (Growth), $2,997 (Enterprise) to be competitive yet premium.
recommendations.differentiation: Emphasize Voice AI, 24/7 lead qualification, and automated follow-up as unique selling points not offered by competitors.
recommendations.transparency: Use transparent pricing to stand out from agencies requiring custom quotes.
recommendations.target_market: Small to mid-sized businesses ($1K-$10K/mo budget) looking for comprehensive lead gen with modern AI technology.
